articles.description: Van Dijk underwent surgery at the end of October but is now back in the gym at the club's AXA Training Centre
articles.content:
Virgil van Dijk is back in Liverpool training less than five weeks after undergoing knee surgery.
The Reds centre-back suffered damage to his anterior cruciate ligament following a reckless tackle f… [+1900 chars]
